Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A powdery drift of snow against the wall. A poem is handwritten across its surface. Peering closely, you notice the tip of a tiny $(this.trait:color) bud which has begun to emerge from the depths of the snow.
A powdery drift of snow against the wall. A poem is handwritten across its surface.
A tiny $(this.trait:color) bud, its tip just visible in the snowdrift.
The bud in the snowdrift retreats from your crude attempt to grab it, slowly re-emerging as your hand is withdrawn.
The handwriting in the snow is gracefully executed, with a distinct feminine touch.
The handwriting in the snow is gracefully executed.

Base:InitialProperties.Base:InitialProperty: "run"
"set this.xtemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.xtemp to nil"
"run"
"emit.actor The snowdrift resists your attempt to erase it. :: exit false"
"run"
"if \$detail \<\> bud then exit true"
"emit.actor The bud in the snowdrift retreats from your crude attempt to grab it, slowly re-emerging as your hand is withdrawn. :: exit false"
"run"
"if \$detail = bud then goto 0030"
"emit.actor You cannot harvest a snowdrift. :: exit false"
"set this.xtemp to \$find(this,#recipients,\$prop(actor.skotos:creator)) :: if \$prop(this.xtemp) = nil then goto 0050"

"emit.actor Recognizing your touch, the bud shyly retires into the snowdrift until your hand is withdrawn.\
\
[OOC: To preserve the rarity of these enchanted flowers, Her Majesty has decreed that one -- and one only -- shall be created for each Skotos account.] :: emit.audience The bud in the snowdrift shyly withdraws from \$brief(actor). :: exit false"

"emit.actor As you gently harvest the \$prop(this.trait:color) bud, it opens into a lovely blossom in your hand!\
\
Moments later, the tip of a fresh bud pushes out of the snowbank. :: emit.audience \$brief(actor) gently harvests the \$prop(this.trait:color) bud in the snowdrift. It opens into a lovely blossom in \ hand!\
\
Moments later, the tip of a fresh bud pushes out of the snowdrift."

"put \$prop(actor.skotos:creator) in this.#recipients :: create silently \$lookup(Generic:flora:flower-deathless) in actor :: empty #stuff in actor :: fill #stuff in actor with actor(Generic:flora:flower-deathless) :: set this.xobj to \$element(actor,#stuff,1) :: set \$obj(this.xobj).trait:color to \$prop(this.trait:color) :: set this.xtemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.xtemp to \$sam(\) :: set \$obj(this.xobj).trait:creator to \$prop(actor.trait:superbrief) [\$date]"

"set this.xtemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.trait:color to \$sam(\{red\|orange\|yellow\|green\|blue\|indigo\|violet\|golden\|magenta\|crimson\|white\|silver\|turquoise\|azure\|cream\|ebony\|pink\|black\|amber\|scarlet\|ochre\|cyan\|purple\|burgundy\}) :: set this.xtemp to \$sam(\)"
"empty #stuff in this :: set this.xtemp to nil :: set this.xobj to nil :: exit false"
"run"

"emit.actor The handwriting in the snowdrift reads:\
\
\\"Foode and clothing wither By and By\
But what ye HARVEST here shall ne'er Die.\\" :: exit false"
"run"
"emit.actor The snowdrift resists your attempt to sign it. :: exit false"
"run"
"emit.actor The snowdrift resists your attempt to write upon it. :: exit false"
"white"
"true"
"true"

"set this.xtemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.trait:color to \$sam(\{red\|orange\|yellow\|green\|blue\|indigo\|violet\|golden\|magenta\|crimson\|white\|silver\|turquoise\|azure\|cream\|ebony\|pink\|black\|amber\|scarlet\|ochre\|cyan\|purple\|burgundy\}) :: set this.xtemp to \$sam(\)"

"emit.actor The handwriting in the snowdrift reads:\
\
\\"Foode and clothing wither By and By\
But what ye HARVEST here shall ne'er Die.\\" :: exit false"
"run"
"emit.actor The snowdrift resists your attempt to sign it. :: exit false"
"run"
"emit.actor The snowdrift resists your attempt to write upon it. :: exit false"
"white"
"true"
"true"
